original_text: “‘Do not have sexual relations with an animal and defile yourself with it. A woman must not present herself to an animal to have sexual relations with it; that is a perversion.
korean_text: 너는 짐승과 교합하여 자기를 더럽히지 말며 여자는 짐승 앞에 서서 그것과 교접하지 말라 이는 문란한 일이니라

sentences.original_text: Do not have sexual relations with an animal
A woman must not present herself to an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 여자는 동물 앞에 자신을 드러내지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: to have sexual relations with it
